item.title: Reflection Yell Command
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

As of right now you are

waiting for a string text to equal “myyell”

then proceeding to open a dialog box to request a string saved as myYell

then changing the original string text to "::yell " + myYell

WHAT THE FUCK

Read full topic

item.title: Reflection Yell Command
item.dc:creator: @Joseph69 Joseph69
item.description:
@Joseph69 wrote:

I am currently using Reflection Cheat Client, and I am trying to create my yell command, my mate has helped me with it, cause I’m a beginner with this. He has guided me through and we have gotten to this:

if(text.equalsIgnoreCase("myyell")) { String myYell = JOptionPane.showInputDialog(null, "Coder", "Akkawi", 3); text = "::yell "+myYell+""; }

We Imported :

import javax.swing.*;
import javax.swing.JOptionPane;

anyone help please ? I type ‘myyell’ in cheat pannel no pannel pops up for me to insert my yell message. Ty

Read full topic
